question:
**Q1** Who was the first actor to portray the Doctor in the classic series?
a.William Hartnell
b.Johnny Cage
c.Brad Pitt
d.Selena Gomez

**Q2** What is the name of the Doctor's time-travelling spaceship?
a.Falcon 9
b. TARDIS (Time and Relative Dimension in Space)
c.VORTEX (Voyager of Reality and Time Exploration)
d.CHRONO (Chronicle of Historical and Navigational Observations)

**Q3** Which alien race is known for their pepper-pot-shaped robotic appearance
a.Roboquillians
b.Martians
c.Daleks
d.Na'vi

**Q4** In which episode did David Tennant's Tenth Doctor regenerate into Matt Smith's Eleventh Doctor?
a."The Time of the Timelords"
b."The End of Time: Part 2"
c."Farewell in the Stars"
d."Pilot"

**Q5** What is the name of the Doctor's home planet?
a.Baldur
b.Earth
c.Teyvat
d.Gallifrey

**Q6** What is the name of the Doctor's iconic sonic screwdriver used for various tasks and unlocking doors?
a.Sonic Screwdriver
b.Timey Twirler
c.Sonic Spanner
d.Temporal Gadget
